alert.note: Alert for Pearl River (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 30 at 3:31AM CST until November 30 at 4:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CST FOR CENTRAL PEARL RIVER COUNTY... At 331 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mcneil, or 9 miles southwest of Poplarville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Poplarville and Mcneil. This includes Interstate 59 in Mississippi between mile markers 16 and 31. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
